name: Toluene, at plant
description: Products obtained from the platforming process include aromatic compounds (benzene, toluene, xylene), chemical hydrogen, light gas, and liquefied petroleum gas. Complete inventory data and metadata are available in full in the final report and appendices, Cradle-to-Gate Life Cycle Inventory of Nine Plastic Resins and Four Polyurethane Precursors. This report has been extensively reviewed within Franklin Associates and has undergone partial critical review by ACC Plastics Division members and is available at: www.americanchemistry.com. Quantities may vary slightly between the reference to main source and and this module due to rounding.  Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet undergone a formal validation process.  Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Catalytic reforming of light petroleum distillate (naphtha)

exchanges.description: Values for barge transport are calculated based on average fuel consumption rates as reported in Transportation Energy Data Book: Edition 22 from Oak Ridge National Laboratory, September 2002: 22% of barges use diesel fuel in their engines, 78% use residual oil to generate steam for steam turbines, and a barge that consumes residual oil consumes 3.4 gallons per 1,000 ton-miles
